metadata.title: CVE-2020-1754 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In Moodle before 3.8.2, 3.7.5, 3.6.9 and 3.5.11, users viewing the gradehistory report without the 'access all groups' capability were notrestricted to viewing grades of users within their own groups.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
